org.apache.geode.cache.util

Class TxEventTestUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.geode.cache.util.TxEventTestUtil

  • public class TxEventTestUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for getting Transaction events for create, invalidate, put, destroy operations.

      • getEntryEventsWithOperation

        public static <K,V> java.util.List<EntryEvent<K,V>> getEntryEventsWithOperation(java.util.List<CacheEvent<K,V>> cacheEvents,
                                                                                java.util.function.Predicate<Operation> operationPredicate)
        Selects the entry events whose operation matches the given predicate.
        Parameters:
        cacheEvents - the cache events from which to select entry events
        operationPredicate - tests each event's operation to determine whether to include the event
        Returns:
        list of entry events whose operations match the given predicate
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassCastException - if the predicate matches the operation of an event that is not an EntryEvent

      • getEntryEventsMatching

        public static <K,V> java.util.List<EntryEvent<K,V>> getEntryEventsMatching(java.util.List<CacheEvent<K,V>> cacheEvents,
                                                                           java.util.function.Predicate<? super EntryEvent<K,V>> predicate)
        Selects the entry events that match the given predicate.
        Parameters:
        cacheEvents - the cache events from which to select entry events
        predicate - tests whether to include each event
        Returns:
        list of entry events that match the predicate
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassCastException - if the predicate matches an event that is not an EntryEvent
